result.eng: As usual, the bus is late.
result.ga: Mar is gnách tá moill ar an bhus
result.orig: Mar is gnách tá moill ar an bhus
result.html: Mar is gnách tá moill ar an bhusAs usual, the bus is late.
result.ponchtml: Mar is gnáċ tá moill ar an ḃusAs usual, the bus is late.

result.ga: Uimhir a deich atá ar an bhus
result.orig: Uimhir a deich atá ar an bhus
result.html: Uimhir a deich atá ar an bhusThe bus number is ten.
result.ponchtml: Uiṁir a deiċ atá ar an ḃusThe bus number is ten.

result.ga: Bhí an chéad bhus ann ag leathuair tar éis a naoi
result.orig: Bhí an chéad bhus ann ag leathuair tar éis a naoi
result.html: Bhí an chéad bhus ann ag leathuair tar éis a naoiThe first bus was at 9.30.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí an ċéad ḃus ann ag leaṫuair tar éis a naoiThe first bus was at 9.30.

result.eng: We went to the city centre on the same bus.
result.ga: Chuaigh muid go lár na cathrach ar an bhus céanna
result.orig: Chuaigh muid go lár na cathrach ar an bhus céanna
result.html: Chuaigh muid go lár na cathrach ar an bhus céannaWe went to the city centre on the same bus.
result.ponchtml: Ċuaiġ muid go lár na caṫraċ ar an ḃus céannaWe went to the city centre on the same bus.
